member.name: shaderStageMask
member.desc: The combination of logical shader stages contained within this shader.

member.name: resourceUsage
member.desc: An instance of VkShaderResourceUsageAMD describing internal physical device resources used by this shader.

member.name: numPhysicalVgprs
member.desc: The maximum number of vector instruction general-purpose registers (VGPRs) available to the physical device.

member.name: numPhysicalSgprs
member.desc: The maximum number of scalar instruction general-purpose registers (SGPRs) available to the physical device.

member.name: numAvailableVgprs
member.desc: The maximum limit of VGPRs made available to the shader compiler.

member.name: numAvailableSgprs
member.desc: The maximum limit of SGPRs made available to the shader compiler.

member.name: computeWorkGroupSize
member.desc: The local workgroup size of this shader in { X, Y, Z } dimensions.
